title: The Colonel's Daughter: SAND Part 1
description: Special Forces Lieutenant and fellow soldiers move heaven and earth to protect the Colonel's daughter from an opium drug lord."It is Stephanie Plum meets Army Wives.. A Must read!"- Sgraveline"Complicated family ties run subtly beneath the high-adrenalin action until the final ultimate complication is revealed on the very final page." - JT Kalnay, author of The Pattern and Mina's Eyes"The characters will stay with you long after the last page and leave you wanting more." - Daniel Stanton, author of City of Champions"From beginning to end. I could not put it down! And there was a shock ending that was a total surprise!" - Wistfulskimmies Book Reviews Blog**Warning** If you don't believe in love at first sight, this book is NOT for you. This book contains fast paced, non-stop action. Do not purchase if you're looking for slow paced. If you can't stand the Roman Catholic Church or the US Military, this book is NOT for you. However, if you like your fiction full of patriotism, honor and love, this book will take you on a pulse racing roller coaster ride where your own imagination can take over.
author: Lili Tufel
